name: Samsung QLED Q90T
description: Experience stunning picture quality and vivid colors with the Samsung QLED Q90T. Featuring Quantum Dot technology and Object Tracking Sound, this TV delivers an immersive viewing experience.

name: LG OLED CX
description: The LG OLED CX offers unparalleled contrast and deep blacks thanks to its OLED display technology. With support for Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos, it provides a cinematic viewing experience.

name: Sony Bravia A8H
description: Experience lifelike images and rich colors with the Sony Bravia A8H OLED TV. Featuring Acoustic Surface Audio, this TV delivers sound that matches the picture quality.

name: TCL 6-Series
description: The TCL 6-Series combines stunning 4K picture performance with Dolby Vision HDR and QLED technology. With Roku TV built-in, you can easily stream your favorite content.

name: Hisense H9G
description: The Hisense H9G features Quantum Dot technology and Full Array Local Dimming for precise contrast and vibrant colors. With Android TV built-in, you have access to a wide range of apps and content.

name: Vizio P-Series Quantum
description: The Vizio P-Series Quantum offers impressive 4K picture quality with Quantum Dot technology and Active Full Array backlight. With SmartCast, you can stream your favorite content from popular apps.

name: Samsung Crystal UHD TU-8000
description: The Samsung Crystal UHD TU-8000 features Crystal Display technology for lifelike colors and clarity. With a sleek design and multiple smart features, it enhances your viewing experience.

name: Sony X800H
description: The Sony X800H offers 4K HDR picture quality with X1 4K HDR Processor and Triluminos Display. With Android TV and Google Assistant built-in, you can easily access your favorite content and control your smart home devices.
